message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,200,000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe its value to you justifies this price. Let's talk.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $950,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is still a bit below what I need to make this deal work.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a significant price reduction, and I'm confident this product will be extremely valuable for you. Let's see if we can finalize this.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am unable to go above $1,000,000. I hope we can find common ground.
